headline: Could Buying Occidental Petroleum Stock Today Set You Up for Life?
summary: For example, a $1,000 investment in Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A)(NYSE: BRK.B) 45 years ago would be worth a staggering $2.7 million today.  A key to Buffett's success in turning Berkshire into a wealth-creating machine has been investing in wonderful companies at fair prices.  One stock Buffett and his team love is Occidental Petroleum (NYSE: OXY).
